products.title: Grain Guard Wood Stain 500ml - Black Ebony - Water-Based, Quick Drying, 12m²/Litre - Interior/Exterior
products.description: GRAIN GUARD Wood Stain | Water Based | Various Colours | 500ml, 1 Litre & 5 Litre - Black Ebony. Experience the superior quality and convenience of GRAIN GUARD Wood Stain, a premium water-based wood stain perfect for enhancing the natural beauty of your wood projects. Our Black Ebony shade, part of a diverse range of colours, offers a deep, rich finish that will transform your furniture or woodworking projects. This water-based formula boasts a low odour, making it ideal for indoor use without harsh chemical smells. It's also environmentally friendly, aligning with our commitment to sustainability. The quick-drying nature of our stain minimizes project time significantly. You don't need to wait excessively long between coats, allowing for efficient completion. This particular 500ml tin of Black Ebony is perfect for smaller projects or touch ups; we also offer 1-litre and 5-litre options to accommodate larger projects. The stain provides a high-quality finish, showcasing the authentic beauty of hardwood. With GRAIN GUARD, you're not just staining wood; you're adding lasting value and elegance. Achieving the perfect shade is easy thanks to our clear application instructions. While single coats suffice for lighter shades like Antique Stripped Pine on pine or light hardwoods, darker shades such as Black Ebony might need between two and three coats for optimal colour depth. Application is straightforward – simply apply liberally along the wood grain using a clean, dry brush. Post-application cleanup is simple too; brushes can be cleaned effortlessly with water. Our stain boasts excellent coverage of 12 square meters per litre, allowing for economical use, maximizing your project's cost-effectiveness. Whether indoors or outdoors, our GRAIN GUARD Wood Stain delivers exceptional performance and lasting results. Our range of colours – including Antique Stripped Pine, Brown Mahogany, Golden Pine, Light Oak, Light Rosewood, Medium Oak, Dark Pine, Dark Walnut, Golden Oak, English Oak, French Oak, Dark Red Mahogany and Very Red Mahogany—ensures a perfect match for any project. Made in Britain, GRAIN GUARD products emphasize superior quality, reflecting our commitment to craftsmanship. The stain's exceptional quality guarantees a professional-looking result. Transform your wooden creations with GRAIN GUARD. Choose from our range of sizes – the 500ml tin is perfect for smaller projects or testing colours, making it the perfect option for individual projects or colour testing prior to investing in larger quantities. Select the option that suits your needs for effortless and beautiful finishes on all your woodworking. This water-based stain is not only quick-drying and easy to apply, but it also offers excellent coverage. Choose GRAIN GUARD, and choose quality and ease.

products.title: Grain Guard Water-Based Aerosol Wood Stain - 400ml Black Ebony - Quick Dry, Long Lasting, Easy Application - For All Woods - Premium Finish
products.description: Transform your wooden furniture and projects with GrainGuard Water Based Aerosol Wood Stain in Black Ebony, a 400ml can of professional-quality stain designed for effortless application and stunning results. This water-based formula is a game-changer for any woodworking enthusiast or DIYer, offering a superior finish compared to traditional oil-based stains. Its aerosol spray application makes covering even the most intricate details a breeze, eliminating the need for messy brushes or rags. The quick-drying formulation means you can apply multiple coats in a short time, significantly speeding up your project completion. Unlike many wood stains that obscure the natural grain, this specially formulated stain actually enhances the wood’s unique beauty, providing excellent grain definition that brings out the richness and character of the wood. products.title: GrainGuard Wood Stain 500ml Dark Pine - Water-Based, Quick Drying, Long Lasting, Interior/Exterior, 12m²/Litre Coverage
products.description: GRAIN GUARD Wood Stain | Water Based | 500ml - Dark Pine: Achieve a stunning, professional-looking finish on your woodworking projects with our premium Dark Pine Wood Stain. This 500ml water-based stain boasts a low-odor, environmentally friendly formula, making it perfectly safe for indoor use, even in sensitive environments like children's playrooms or bedrooms. Its quick-drying nature means you can complete your projects faster, saving you valuable time and minimizing disruption. Unlike oil-based stains, cleanup is a breeze, simply washing your brushes with water once finished. This exceptional stain delivers a high-quality finish that brings out the natural beauty of the wood grain, enhancing its character and warmth. We at GRAIN GUARD are committed to providing only the highest-quality products, and this stain is a testament to that commitment, offering an authentic hardwood finish that lasts. This particular Dark Pine shade typically requires one to two coats for optimal color depth, though you can add further coats for a more intense hue. The application process is simple; just use a clean, dry brush and apply the stain liberally, following the direction of the wood grain. For best results on pine and light hardwoods, refer to the detailed application guide: Antique Stripped Pine, Brown Mahogany, Golden Pine, Light Oak, Light Rosewood, and Medium Oak usually require a single coat, while Dark Pine, Dark Walnut, and Golden Oak typically require one to two coats. Black Ebony, English Oak, French Oak, Dark Red Mahogany, and Very Red Mahogany will require two to three coats for optimal coverage. One liter of our stain covers approximately 12 square meters, so this 500ml tin will offer ample coverage for smaller projects. Our comprehensive range also includes a variety of other beautiful colors, allowing you to create a personalized, stylish look for all your wood finishes. Choose from Antique Stripped Pine, Brown Mahogany, Golden Pine, Light Oak, Light Rosewood, Medium Oak, Dark Walnut, Golden Oak, Black Ebony, English Oak, French Oak, Dark Red Mahogany, and Very Red Mahogany to find the perfect shade to complement your design. This exceptional wood stain is ideal for interior and exterior use, making it perfect for furniture, cabinetry, trim, and much more. Made in Britain, this product reflects our dedication to superior quality and craftsmanship, using sustainable practices in both sourcing and production. Experience the difference of GRAIN GUARD's water-based wood stains and transform your wood projects into timeless masterpieces. Enjoy the easy application, quick drying time, and stunning, long-lasting results of a truly superior product. Elevate your woodworking to the next level with this top quality product. Choose GRAIN GUARD for environmentally friendly, superior quality, long-lasting results!

products.title: Grain Guard Water-Based Aerosol Wood Stain - 400ml Black Ebony - Quick Dry, Long Lasting, Easy Application - For All Woods - Premium Finish
products.description: Transform your wooden furniture and projects with GrainGuard Water Based Aerosol Wood Stain in Black Ebony, a 400ml can of professional-quality stain designed for effortless application and stunning results. This water-based formula is a game-changer for any woodworking enthusiast or DIYer, offering a superior finish compared to traditional oil-based stains. Its aerosol spray application makes covering even the most intricate details a breeze, eliminating the need for messy brushes or rags. The quick-drying formulation means you can apply multiple coats in a short time, significantly speeding up your project completion. Unlike many wood stains that obscure the natural grain, this specially formulated stain actually enhances the wood’s unique beauty, providing excellent grain definition that brings out the richness and character of the wood. You can achieve a deep, luxurious black ebony finish that adds a touch of elegance to any piece, whether it's a cherished antique or a newly crafted masterpiece. Suitable for all wooden substrates, from fine hardwoods to softwoods, this versatile stain is ideal for rejuvenating old furniture like tables, chairs, sideboards, and cupboards, or for adding a professional-quality touch to new projects. The long-lasting, attractive finish protects your wood against everyday wear and tear while retaining its natural beauty. The rich Black Ebony color is just one of several gorgeous shades available in the GrainGuard range, providing endless possibilities for your creative projects. With GrainGuard Water Based Aerosol Wood Stain, you'll achieve premium results with ease and speed, giving your wood a beautifully enhanced look that will last for years to come. This aerosol spray offers superior control and even coverage, avoiding the drips and uneven application often associated with traditional methods. The water-based formula is also low-odor, making it a safer and more pleasant option for indoor projects, unlike harsh chemical-laden alternatives. Its fast drying time prevents smudging and allows for quicker project turnarounds. Transform your wooden surfaces with ease and achieve that professional-grade finish youve always dreamed of with GrainGuard.
